body_html:
The interesting thing is that on python 2.7, the RSS memory usage of test_jit goes:
200mb ... 4 gb (at test_snli) ... stays ~4gb

While on python 3.7, the RSS memory usage goes:
200mb .. 4 gb (at test_snli) .. 1.3gb (after test_snli)

Not really sure why that happens but I guess it doesn't matter

body:
The interesting thing is that on python 2.7, the RSS memory usage of test_jit goes:
200mb ... 4 gb (at test_snli) ... stays ~4gb

While on python 3.7, the RSS memory usage goes:
200mb .. 4 gb (at test_snli) .. 1.3gb (after test_snli)

Not really sure why that happens but I guess it doesn't matter
